Package pl.polsl.youssef.albali.vigenere.cipher.model

package pl.polsl.youssef.albali.vigenere.cipher.model
Contains two class: VigenereCipherModel model of the application responsible of encrypting and decrypting using Vigenère cipher of keywords: package and import and InvalidCharacterException exception used when an an invalid key or string was chosen
  • Class
    Description
    EmptyKey
    Exception class for objects thrown when the the key is empty
    InvalidCharacterException
    Exception class for objects thrown when the text contains a character outside of English letters
    VigenereCipherModel
    Model class of the application responsible of encrypting and decrypting using Vigenère cipher
    VigenereCipherModel.ConvertOperation
    Interface used for text conversions
